title: COVID19 in Qatar
description: Tables communicating the impact of COVID19 in Qatar
contents:
Data Description
The data is sourced from the tidycovid19 R package created by Joachim Gassen on Github, which in turn sourced the data from The Johns Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering (JHU CSSE) publicly available Github repository. JHU CSSE collated the numbers from the responsible body of each country.
The data contains the following variables:
variable
class
description
country
character
Country name
iso3c
character
ISO3c country code as defined by ISO 3166-1 alpha-3
date
date
Calendar date
confirmed
numeric
Covid-19 cases (accumulated)
deaths
numeric
Covid-19 deaths (accumulated)
recovered
numeric
Covid-19 recoveries (accumulated)
